name: Idol Magical Girl Chiru Chiru Michiru
storyline: Matsushima Michiru is an unpopular Idol whose dream is to someday become as famous as the admired idol, Kazami Kazuki. One night, while looking up to the sky, she saw a falling star and wished upon it to quickly become a top idol. However, the falling star turned out to be the familiar cat Nyanmel, who came from a magical world, and in order to save the world, he told Michiru that she would have to become a magical girl.
summary: Idol Magical Girl Chiru Chiru Michiru is a visual novel and a spin-off in the Grisaia series of visual novels. The game will have an anime-alike format in 13 episodes. You play as Matsushima Michiru as she dreams of becoming an idolized singer but only performs at a dingy basement bar on the weekends. One night, Michiru sees a falling star and wishes upon it to make her dreams come true.
